metadata.description: The colorful and poetic journey of a little girl who discovers a parallel world at the heart of the industrial metropolis she lives in. Addidas is a bright and quirky young girl who spends most of her time helping her widowed father in his job as a chimney sweep.  When Addidas ventures too far into a chimney, she encounters a bizarre new friend and in the process destabilizes a long-established system.  From prolific independent European creators Wazem and Peeters ( Blue Pills ) comes a touching and existential story that balances its fantastical elements with poignant and realistic themes.
metadata.name: Koma
